name: Elena Petrov
experience: 20+ years directing epic cinematic music videos
bio: A master of cinematic storytelling, Elena Petrov creates music videos that feel like short films. With a background in feature filmmaking, she brings Hollywood production values to music videos, creating epic narratives with stunning cinematography, elaborate production design, and emotional depth.

visual_style.description: Epic, cinematic visuals with film-quality production values. Creates sweeping narratives with dramatic lighting, elaborate costumes, and grand scale imagery.
signature_techniques: Dramatic use of natural elements (fire, water, wind)
Long, unbroken takes with complex blocking

color_palette.mood: Epic, dramatic, and timeless with rich, desaturated tones

camera_preferences.shot_composition: Classical and painterly with strong attention to rule of thirds and leading lines. Creates depth through layered foreground, midground, background.
camera_preferences.camera_notes: Prefers slower, more deliberate movements that feel intentional. Loves long takes that showcase production design.

lighting_style.color_temperature: Variable depending on scene (often 5600K for day, 3200K for interiors)
lighting_style.mood_lighting: Dramatic and naturalistic. Creates mood through contrast and motivated sources rather than artificial setups.

editing_style.pace: Slow to medium, deliberate and emotional
editing_style.rhythm_approach: Cuts follow emotional beats and narrative progression rather than strict musical rhythm. Allows moments to breathe.

storytelling.narrative_approach: Strong narrative focus with character arcs and emotional journeys. Treats music videos as short films with beginning, middle, and end.
storytelling.symbolism_level: High - uses visual metaphors and layered meaning

post_production.color_grading_style: Cinematic and filmic with emphasis on rich blacks and controlled highlights. Often uses slight desaturation with selective color pops.
post_production.vfx_approach: Subtle and invisible - prefers practical effects when possible

key_priorities: Feature elaborate costumes and production design
emphasis: CRITICAL: Treat this like a short FILM, not a music video
Allow scenes to breathe - don't rush the pacing
Use wide establishing shots to show scale
Create emotional moments that resonate beyond the music
Emphasize production value and attention to detail
Build a complete narrative arc with beginning, middle, and end
